roles.title: Associate of Science, Information Technology
description: Core coursework in software engineering principles, database management, and web application development.
Developing strong foundational skills in programming logic and Java data structures.

roles.title: Bachelor of Science, Customized Studies in Leadership
description: Focus on organizational leadership, project management, and team dynamics.
Coursework centered on effective communication, strategic planning, and ethical leadership.

roles.title: Certificate, Business & Information Technology
description: Completed a comprehensive vocational program covering business fundamentals and information technology applications.
Gained practical skills in office administration and assistive technology usage.
